generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, visible with pedestrians walking on them and bordered by curbs.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial storefronts and residential apartments.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalks and street, providing greenery.
- terrain: Grass and small patches of vegetation are visible along the sidewalks and in small areas between the road and buildings.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalks and crossing the street.
- car: Several cars are parked along the sides of the road, and one car is visible in the distance.
- traffic sign: A "30 ZONE" speed limit sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those holding traffic signs and streetlights.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk near the left side of the road.
